name: Greg ABBOTT, Governor of Texas, et al., appellants, v. Shannon PEREZ, et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Greg ABBOTT, Governor of Texas, et al., appellants,
v.
Shannon PEREZ, et al.
attorneys: Motion of the Solicitor General for divided argument and the motion of appellees for enlargement of time for oral argument and for divided argument is granted, and the time is divided as follows: 25 minutes for appellants, 10 minutes for the Solicitor General in support of appellants, 15 minutes for appellees in No. 17-586, and 20 minutes for appellees in No. 17-626.
casebody.head_matter:
Greg ABBOTT, Governor of Texas, et al., appellants,
v.
Shannon PEREZ, et al.
No. 17-626.
Supreme Court of the United States
April 13, 2018.
Motion of the Solicitor General for divided argument and the motion of appellees for enlargement of time for oral argument and for divided argument is granted, and the time is divided as follows: 25 minutes for appellants, 10 minutes for the Solicitor General in support of appellants, 15 minutes for appellees in No. 17-586, and 20 minutes for appellees in No. 17-626.
